price: 51 Allah rétribuera ainsi chacun selon ses œuvres dont Il est si prompt à faire le compte.
arabic: لِيَجۡزِيَ ٱللَّهُ كُلَّ نَفۡسٖ مَّا كَسَبَتۡۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ سَرِيعُ ٱلۡحِسَابِ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: liyajziya al-lahu kulla nafsin mā kasabat inna al-laha sarīʿu al-ḥisābi
